sent.orig: Mind you, don't trip over these roots; they're difficult to see under all these leaves.
sent.trans: 当心别被那些树根绊倒，它们埋在这些树叶底下不容易发现。

sent.orig: These qualities adorn the character of Portia,and these go to accomplish a perfect woman.
sent.trans: 这些品质使得鲍西娅的性格更加光彩照人，也使得一个高尚的女性形象更加完美。

sent.orig: "The Star Chart" written by Gan De and "Astronomy" by Shi Shen of the Warring States Period (475 B.C.-221 B.C.) were the earliest star catalogues in the world. The two star charts presented in the books record positions of 120 stars. These positions, recorded 200 years earlier than those by other countries, are remarkably accurate, even by modern standards.
sent.trans: 中国战国时代甘德著的《星点》和石申著的《天文》是世界上最早的星表。 两表里记有120颗恒星的位置， 至今还非常准确， 比其他国家观测恒星早200多年。

sent.orig: A customs union would integrate the economies of these countries.
sent.trans: 关税联盟会把这些国家的经济紧密结合在一起。

sent.orig: A game that is very popular with these young swimmers is the underwater tricycle race.
sent.trans: 这些幼小的游泳运动员非常喜爱的一项运动就是水下三轮车比赛。
